examples.example: 在二十岁的美好年华里，我们应该努力追逐自己的梦想。

translate.english: In the beautiful years of twenty, we should strive to pursue our own dreams.

examples.example: 二十年后的我一定会感谢现在努力奋斗的自己。

translate.english: Twenty years later, I will definitely thank myself who is striving hard now.

examples.example: 二十个春秋转瞬即逝，我依然保持着对生活的热爱和憧憬。

translate.english: Twenty years have passed in the twinkling of an eye, and I still keep the love and longing for life.
